column4: Tourism;Kampot: ------The Kampot Provincial Police Office would like to inform all businessmen and citizens that Kampot province will hold the 8thSea Festival on December 20-22
column5: 2019.------ Please protect your personal property during the festival as well as keep an eye out for these felons pictured ------HERE. ------If seen
column6: please report them Call the Provincial Police Commissioner or the Kampot Municipal Police Inspectorate via telephone on: 097 778 0010/077 778 0104. The smae number can be used to report any criminal activity.
